ID's     are assigned the new intance's index of that array","params":{"_amount":"the reward amount to be distributed","_delay":"the number of blocks to delay after the end of the period that the reward can be claimed","_description":"description of the reward","_duration":"the block duration over which reference token earnings are calculated","_isMerit":"Recurring dividend reward or one-off merit reward","_occurrences":"the number of occurrences of a dividend reward","_referenceToken":"the token used to calculate reward distributions for each holder","_rewardToken":"currency received as reward, accepts address 0 for ETH reward","_startBlock":"block in which token transactions will begin to be tracked"},"return":"rewardId of the newly created Reward"},"transferToVault(address)":{"params":{"_token":"Token balance to be sent to recovery vault."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"claimReward(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim my reward for #`_rewardID`"},"getReward(uint256)":{"notice":"Gets information for the reward with ID #`rewardID`"},"getRewardsLength()":{"notice":"Get total rewards count"},"getTotalAmountClaimed(address)":{"notice":"Get total amount of `_token` claimed"},"initialize(address)":{"notice":"Initialize Rewards app for Vault at `_vault`"},"newReward(string,bool,address,address,uint256,uint64,uint64,uint8,uint64)":{"notice":"Create a `_isMerit ? 'merit reward' : 'dividend'` that will distribute `@tokenAmount(_rewardToken, _amount)` to token holders who `_isMerit ? 'earned ' : 'hold '` `_referenceToken.symbol(): string` `(_occurrences > 1) ? ' from block ' + _startBlock + ' to block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) + '. This dividend will disburse every ' + _duration + ' blocks in proportion to the holders balance on the disbursement date. The first disbursement occurs at the end of the first cycle, on block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) + '.' : (_isMerit ? 'from block ' + _startBlock + 'to block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) +'.' : 'on block '+ _startBlock + '.')` (Reference: `_description`)"},"transferToVault(address)":{"notice":"Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

claimReward(uint256).details: Allows a user to claim their reward (if one is available)
claimReward(uint256).return: rewardAmount calculated for that reward ID

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

getReward(uint256).details: Allows a user to get information about a specific reward
getReward(uint256).return: description message for this rewardisMerit true or false in case it is a dividend rewardreferenceToken used as reference to weight the rewardrewardToken used to pay the rewardamount for this rewardstartBlock when the reward went activeendBlock when the reward period endedduration number of blocks for the reward durationdelay in number of blocks in case the reward claiming is postponedrewardAmount which amount is available to claimtimeClaimed when it was claimed by the msg.sendercreator the address of the reward creator

getRewardsLength().details: Gets the lenght of the rewards registry array
getRewardsLength().return: rewardsLength the length of the rewards array

getTotalAmountClaimed(address).details: Gets the amount of this token claimed

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

initialize(address).details: Initializes the Rewards app, this is the Aragon custom constructor

params._vault: Address of the vault Rewards will rely on (non changeable)

newReward(string,bool,address,address,ui.details: This function creates a reward instance to be added to the rewards array. ID's     are assigned the new intance's index of that array

params._amount: the reward amount to be distributed
params._delay: the number of blocks to delay after the end of the period that the reward can be claimed
params._duration: the block duration over which reference token earnings are calculated
params._isMerit: Recurring dividend reward or one-off merit reward
params._occurrences: the number of occurrences of a dividend reward
params._referenceToken: the token used to calculate reward distributions for each holder
params._rewardToken: currency received as reward, accepts address 0 for ETH reward
params._startBlock: block in which token transactions will begin to be tracked

newReward(string,bool,address,address,ui.return: rewardId of the newly created Reward

params._token: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

getReward(uint256).notice: Gets information for the reward with ID #`rewardID`

initialize(address).notice: Initialize Rewards app for Vault at `_vault`

newReward(string,bool,address,address,ui.notice: Create a `_isMerit ? 'merit reward' : 'dividend'` that will distribute `@tokenAmount(_rewardToken, _amount)` to token holders who `_isMerit ? 'earned ' : 'hold '` `_referenceToken.symbol(): string` `(_occurrences > 1) ? ' from block ' + _startBlock + ' to block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) + '. This dividend will disburse every ' + _duration + ' blocks in proportion to the holders balance on the disbursement date. The first disbursement occurs at the end of the first cycle, on block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) + '.' : (_isMerit ? 'from block ' + _startBlock + 'to block ' + (_startBlock + _duration) +'.' : 'on block '+ _startBlock + '.')` (Reference: `_description`)

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.
